modules.description: Provides functions to serialize and deserialize OCaml values to and from XML, supporting custom type annotations. Works with OCaml's variant, record, and sum types, enabling structured data exchange. Used to generate XML representations of configuration data and parse external XML files into typed OCaml structures.

Converts OCaml types to and from XML by generating serialization and deserialization functions. Works with OCaml's type system, including records, variants, and primitives. Used to parse XML documents into typed OCaml values and generate XML from structured data.
